properties.Name: PolicyAmountAtRisk
properties.Description: The difference between the face amount of the policy and the reserve or policy value at a given time.    This equates to the dollar amount over what the policy holder has contributed.   As the cash value increased over time the remaining amount at risk decreased until it reaches zero - when the cash value or reserve becomes the face amount.

Columns.Name: AsOfDate
Columns.Description: The as of risk evaluation date, or date at which the at risk amount is determined or valued.

Columns.Name: InsurancePolicyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Policy.

Columns.Name: AtRiskAmount
Columns.Description:
The at risk amount.

The difference between the face amount of the policy and the reserve or policy value at a given time.    

This equates to the dollar amount over what the policy holder has contributed.   As the cash value increased over time the remaining amount at risk decreased until it reaches zero - when the cash value or reserve becomes the face amount.

As the cash value increased over time the remaining amount at risk decreased until it reaches zero - when the cash value or reserve becomes the face amount.
